ygData.subject: RE: Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: The orcs are affiliated with the Shralok orcs of Highpass.  There is a Chief so-so Shralok, and Captain Shralok, as well as named orcs with the last name
ygData.messageBody:
The orcs are affiliated with the Shralok orcs of Highpass. There is a Chief
so-so Shralok, and Captain Shralok, as well as named orcs with the last name
Shralok.


> ----------
> From: Symber Ash[SMTP:symber1@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 5:25 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
>
> From: "Symber Ash" <symber1@...>
>
> There are a few Named orcs that spawn near HH...They all have the same
> last
> name...one of them is Chief so and so...and he's level 20 I think...I have
> seen five or six different orcs near there...
>
> There are no official orc camps in the zone, tho....BTW if you're going to
> hunt Kithicor, I advise you to get a compass, or max out your sense
> heading
> skill...it gets very confusing for some reason...I still get lost
> sometimes...
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: G2 Dan <drockwell@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 5:34 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
>
>
> >From: "G2 Dan" <drockwell@...>
> >
> >What is up with Kithicor? I ran into a mean RED orc there the other nite
> >that chased me out of there and into Rivervale in a hurry. All I
> remember
> >was the painful hits and a "lord something" attached to his name. Any
> >clues? Is there an orc camp in the zone?
> >
> >Gediprime
> >17th Lvl & Lovin it!
> >Xegony
> >
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: Symber Ash <symber1@...>
> >To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> >Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 11:33 AM
> >Subject: Re: [eqbards] Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
> >
> >
> >> From: "Symber Ash" <symber1@...>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >> >From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
> >> >everything Kithicor (ALWAYS a good bet for mysterious adventure, there
> is
> >a
> >> bizarre hidden
> >> >story in that woods, over on Crossroads of Norath/Discussions we have
> a
> >> little Kithicor fan club....
> >>
> >>
> >> Finally someone else notices...I get sick of those messages that say
> >> something like, "We need to get rid of useless zones....like Kithicor"
> >>
> >> I adventured there for more than a few levels, and I still get a kick
> out
> >of
> >> that dark place...Have you ever met Kithicor himself? I saw him once
> by
> >the
> >> cabin with the grizzley bears and the flag. He didn't say much...
> >>
> >> Ryndal
> >> Level 18 Bard
> >> Cazic-Thule
